text: Chantiuli chakole chilanga (chantunjelele) kwa Allah ni kwa Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ akuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu, kutendaga ŵanganyao ali ŵakasa ilanga)? Ikaŵeje aŵala ŵamwataŵene nao chilanga (chantunjelele) pa Nsikiti Wakuchimbichika (wa Maaka). Basi mwatalonjelele ali nkunnungamichila nombe jenumanja mwalungamichilani, chisimu Allah akwanonyela ŵawoga (wakun'jogopa Jwalakwe)
